scripts.test-incentives: npm run compile && npx hardhat test test-suites/test-aave/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-aave/incentives/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-ext-rewards: npm run compile && npx hardhat test ./test-suites/test-aave/__setup.spec.ts  ./test-suites/test-aave/incentives/external/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-scenarios: npm run compile && npx hardhat test test-suites/test-aave/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-aave/scenario.spec.ts
scripts.test-subgraph:scenarios: npm run compile && hardhat --network hardhatevm_docker test test-suites/test-aave/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-aave/subgraph-scenarios.spec.ts
scripts.test:main:check-list: npm run compile && FORK=main TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test  test-suites/test-aave/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-aave/mainnet/check-list.spec.ts
scripts.vmex:deploy:fork:main: npm run compile && FORK=main hardhat vmex:mainnet --network localhost
scripts.vmex:deploy:fork:optimism: npm run compile && FORK=optimism hardhat sidechain:mainnet --pool Optimism --network optimism_localhost
scripts.vmex:deploy:fork:base: npm run compile && FORK=base hardhat sidechain:mainnet --pool Base --network base_localhost
scripts.vmex:dev:deploy: npm run compile && hardhat vmex:dev --network localhost
scripts.vmex:goerli:deploy: npm run compile && hardhat vmex:dev --verify --network goerli
scripts.vmex:sepolia:deploy: npm run compile && hardhat vmex:dev --network sepolia
scripts.vmex:docker:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- vmex:mainnet --skip-registry
scripts.matic:mumbai:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:mumbai sidechain:mainnet -- --pool Matic --skip-registry
scripts.matic:matic:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic sidechain:mainnet -- --pool Matic --skip-registry
scripts.avalanche:fuji:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:fuji avalanche:mainnet -- --pool Avalanche
scripts.vmex:docker:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- vmex:mainnet
scripts.matic:mumbai:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:mumbai sidechain:mainnet -- --pool Matic
scripts.matic:matic:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic sidechain:mainnet -- --pool Matic
scripts.avalanche:fuji:full:migration:add-regist: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:fuji avalanche:mainnet -- --pool Avalanche
scripts.avalanche:mainnet:full:migration:add-reg: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:avalanche avalanche:mainnet -- --pool Avalanche
scripts.vmex:docker:add-market-to-registry-from-: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Aave
scripts.matic:mumbai:add-market-to-registry-from: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:mumbai add-market-to-registry --pool Matic
scripts.matic:matic:add-market-to-registry-from-: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic add-market-to-registry --pool Matic
scripts.vmex:main:add-market-to-registry-from-co: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- add-market-to-registry --pool Aave
scripts.vmex:docker:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Aave --deploy-registry
scripts.matic:mumbai:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:mumbai add-market-to-registry --pool Matic --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.matic:matic:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic -- add-market-to-registry --pool Matic --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.vmex:main:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:matic -- add-market-to-registry --pool Matic --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.vmex:fork:main:tenderly: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:tenderly-main -- vmex:mainnet
scripts.vmex:main:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- vmex:mainnet --verify
scripts.vmex:main:full:initialize: npm run compile && FORK=main full:initialize-tokens --pool Aave
scripts.vmex:optimism:full:migration: npm run compile && hardhat sidechain:mainnet --pool Optimism --network optimism --verify
scripts.vmex:optimism:upgrade:incentives: npm run compile && hardhat vmex:upgrade-incentives --network optimism --verify
scripts.vmex:optimism:redeploy:weth-gateway: npm run compile && hardhat full-redeploy-weth-gateway --pool Optimism --network optimism --verify
scripts.vmex:base:full:migration: npm run compile && hardhat sidechain:mainnet --pool Base --network base --verify
scripts.ci:test: npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.external:deploy-assets-main: npm run compile && hardhat --network main external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify
